auth_algorithm.description: Authentication algorithm for IPsec policy, default:sha1. (choices: sha1, sha256, sha384, sha512)

encapsulation_mode.description: Encapsulation mode for IPsec policy, default:tunnel. (choices: tunnel, transport)

encryption_algorithm.description: Encryption algorithm for IPsec policy, default:aes-128.

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

lifetime.description: IPsec lifetime attributes. 'units'-seconds, default:seconds. 'value'-non negative integer, default:3600.

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

pfs.description: Perfect Forward Secrecy for IPsec policy, default:group5.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

transform_protocol.description: Transform protocol for IPsec policy, default:esp. (choices: esp, ah, ah-esp)
